LanguageData.MousekinRace_DesignatorFertilizeSoilDesc: Designate terrain in growing zones to be fertilized with {0}, boosting fertility by {1}.\n\nAfter harvest, the terrain will revert back to its normal fertility and will need to be fertilized again manually.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_DesignatorFertilizeSoil_Err: Must designate terrain in growing zones.
